plot: Gordon McCloud is the manager of a second tier Scottish football team. Faced with pressure from his American owner, he is forced to bring on a marquee player to improve the fortunes of the team and prevents its being moved from the fiercely loyal town it's been for a century. Along the way, McLeod must battle his own demons, including long-standing tiffs with both his daughter and a former colleague who betrayed him.   Written by  Chris Neuman
title: A Shot at Glory
plot_es: Gordon McCloud is the manager of a second tier Scottish football team.
